result.execSummary:
The defendant J Inocente Mondragon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant J Inocente Mondragon in court with attorney John H. Bradley.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State gives recommendation.  Attorney Bradley agrees and states credit for time served.  State reviews documentation re: credit.  Guilty Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Defendant guilty.  Court imposes sentence.
Count 1:
$243.00 costs and $200.00 DNA sample, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.
80 Days in Sauk County Jail, with huber, consecutive.  64 days credit.  
Submit to DNA sample.  
Paperwork handed in court.
from ATTY Bradley with notes from court

Pre-trial conference at 07-17-2015 10:15 am.
Return date at 07-31-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant J Inocente Mondragon in court.  Sue Mueller and Rick S appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advises court he is in the process of retaining Attorney John Bradley.  State agrees they have received correspondence.  Court resets PTC/RD.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 17, 2015 at 10:15 am.  Return date scheduled for July 31, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
not to go upon Poppy Waterman Ice Arena in Lake Delton

Pre-trial conference at 06-19-2015 10:00 am.
Return date at 07-01-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant J Inocente Mondragon appeared by video means from LEC w/atty. Puck Tsai. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint. Advised rights to an attorney.  DE on probation and should be supervised, State requests $500.00 Cash bond.   File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  $1000.00 Signature bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  not go upon Poppy Waterman Ice Arena in Lake Delton; no possession of controlled substances w/valid Rx.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 19, 2015 at 10:00 am.  Return date scheduled for July 1, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
